me.mcblueparrot.spade.api.entity

Interface Player

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommandSender, Entity, Humanoid, LivingEntity, OfflinePlayer, ProjectileSource

    public interface Player
extends LivingEntity, Humanoid, OfflinePlayer
    Represents a player.
